[http://files.drdteam.org/index.php/files/get/Im-5ggfWQk/xim-marines.zip DRD Team Share Space download] }} [[Xim's Helper Marines]] WAD is a wad, made by Xim, based off of the Helper Marine item featured in wads such as [[NeoDoom]]. It was made because he was a little put off with the marines all having the same weapons in their hands. And since marine sprites with different weapons were in "high demand" at the time, he thought it'd be a good idea to make the marines have different weapon sprites. Another purpose of the wad is to also be a collection of marines with different weapons, so it can be used a resource wad. He has since discontinued working on this, and future sprites made are being included in the [http://forum.zdoom.org/viewtopic.php?f=19&t=24210 Marine Skins] pack organized by Ghastly Dragon. == Featured Marines == ===Standard Doom Weapons=== *[[Classes:Fist|Fist]] Marine - Sprite by: Mark Quinn *[[Classes:Pistol|Pistol]] Marine - Sprite by: Mark Quinn *[[Classes:Shotgun|Shotgun]] Marine - Sprite by: Mark Quinn *[[Classes:Chaingun|Chaingun]] Marine - Sprite by: Anthony Cole *[[Classes:RocketLauncher|Rocket]] Marine - Sprite by: Xim *[[Classes:PlasmaRifle|Plasma]] Marine - Sprite by: CaptainToenail *[[Classes:BFG9000|BFG9000]] Marine - Sprite by: Toke *[[Classes:Chainsaw|Chainsaw]] Marine - Sprite by: Mark Quinn *[[Classes:SuperShotgun|Super Shotgun]] Marine - Sprite by: Xim and The Skulltag Team ===Skulltag Weapons=== *[[Classes:Minigun|Minigun]] Marine - Sprite by: Xim *[[Classes:GrenadeLauncher|Grenade]] Marine - Sprite by: Xim *[[Classes:Railgun|Railgun]] Marine - Sprite by: Xim and FuzzballFox *[[Classes:BFG10K|BFG10k]] Marine - Sprite by: Xim ===Additional Weapons=== *Rifle Marine - Sprite by: Id Software *Dual Pistol Marine - Sprite by: Daniel *Knife Marine - Sprite by: Xim *SMG Marine - Sprite by: Xim *Sawed Off Marine - Sprite by: Xim and Captain Toenail *Sonic Railgun Marine - Sprite by: Xim *Bazooka Marine - Sprite by: Xim and The Innocent Crew *[[Classes:RevenantTracer|RevRocket]] Marine - Sprite by: Xim *Unmaker Marine - Sprite by: Xim *Repeater Marine - Sprite by: Xim and Ghastly Dragon *Flamethrower Marine - Sprite by: Xim *[[Classes:Backpack|Backpacker]] Marine - Sprite by: Xim *[[Classes:Medikit|Medic]] Marine - Sprite by: Xim
